name: the-logbook
description: Open-source modular intranet platform for fire departments and emergency services

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Python backend does not require build step'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && flake8 app/ && black --check app/
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && black app/ && isort app/
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:rollback && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/__pycache__ backend/**/__pycache__ backend/.pytest_cache

author: Intranet Platform Contributors
